article_title: Twelve killed in Israeli strike on Gaza school, civil defence says
sentence: At  least  12  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  on  a  school  housing  displaced  people  in  Gaza  City,  the  Hamas-run  Civil  Defence  authority  says.
